meanings.definition: A long fictional narrative in prose.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading novels before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: She borrowed a stack of novels from the library.
meanings.sent3: The novels on the shelf whispered stories to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her life was a series of novels waiting to be written.
meanings.sent5: The novels painted vivid pictures in my mind.

meanings.definition: New and not resembling something formerly known or used.
meanings.sent1: He wore a pair of novels shoes to the party.
meanings.sent2: The artist showcased her novel painting at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The novel flavor of the ice cream surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her novel approach to problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The novel design of the building stood out in the cityscape.
